title: Clarifications on end of season rewards for who got banned back in March
body:
Can someone help me with soemthing?, i got banned for some days back in march/april, shame on me, but after that i started playing like a normal human being again. IS a ban that is so far back in time still effecting my end of season rewards?

Bascially, someone that got banned has a chance to redeem himself or he is doomed?

I'd also like to udnerstand if the ba is the cause of me not going over level 2 honor, since i cannot find answeres anywhere

replies.body: With the ban being that far back you are in the clear for rewards!Our Ranked [Rewards Faq ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068)will give you a run down if you want some back bone to my  statement :)

> [{quoted}](name=GoldPikaKnight,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=aucAXJhR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-26T21:50:23.821+0000)
>
> With the ban being that far back you are in the clear for rewards!Our Ranked [Rewards Faq ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068)will give you a run down if you want some back bone to my  statement :)

Thanks a lot! :)
